definition[0]: to take money from your bank account
definition[1]: to make someone feel less shy and more willing to talk
example[0]: She just needed someone to draw her out and take an interest in her.
definition[2]: to mention a particular piece of information and explain it clearly and in detail
example[1]: There are two major themes to be drawn out in this discussion.
definition[3]: to make an event last longer than usual
example[2]: The final question drew the meeting out for another hour.
definition[4]: if the days or nights draw out, it stays light until later in the evening because summer is coming
